name: Kineko
description: Kineko is a fully-licensed, high-throughput bookmaker focused on casino games and Sports/Esports betting. Kineko currently accepts many cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, USDC, and USDT. Since launching in 2021, thousands of users have bet on the Kineko platform. Kineko is on track to surpass $500MM in betting volume in 2022. 33.33% of profits are used to buy back $KNK in the open market every month, creating a deflationary token. Buybacks are expected to reward long term holders of $KNK due to the combination of an engaged and growing user base, concurrent with declining coin supply.
